game_comments: Jeopardy game for the December 29th 2023 Holiday Party
title: Holiday Party Jeopardy
comments: Jeopardy game for the December 29th 2023 Holiday Party

category_J_1.category_comments: (Alex: All of the clues were recorded at the Ronald Reagan Presidential Library, where they were having a very special baseball exhibition.)

category_J_6.category_comments: (Alex: Each correct response will begin with a form of the verb "to be".)
